description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Project Description:
              
              Luxoft is extending it's offerings in order to lead digital transformation initiatives, enable collaboration of global development teams, and address growing demand for data and source codes storage and accessibility.
              
              Contract 3 months position.  We are considering permanent position after contract.
              
              Responsibilities:
              
              You will be responsible for migrating a web application from Ruby language to GoLang
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              Skills:
              
              Technical Skills (Essential):
              
              Golang 3+ years
              
              GIT
              
              Understanding software development life-cycle
              
              Experience with Рhabricator is an advantage.
              

              Technical Skills (Desirable):
              
              * Nice to have: Ruby
              
              ∙ Continuous integration Tools (Buck, Teamcity, Jenkins)
              
              ∙ Golang build, vendoring systems (go dep, Glide)
              
              ∙ Common requirements management (Jama, JIRA, Confluence)
              
              ∙ Source control (CVS, SVN)
              
              ∙ Binary Management Tools (Nexus, Artifactory)
              
              Notice period: Immediately
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
